title: Melbourne city parade
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
abstract: Melbourne - Queen Mother in Melbourne during a Moomba parade.
description: Silent film of the Queen Mother arriving at the Melbourne Town Hall during a Moomba parade. Includes scenes of crowds lining Swanston Street; the Lord Mayor's welcoming speech to the Queen Mother; and her departure in an open car as she waves to the crowd. Filmed by portrait photographer Athol Adams. Athol Adams footage is courtesy of Jenny and Owen Peake.
